channel.title: India on Economic Indicators
channel.description: Recent content in India on Economic Indicators

item.title: India GDP Composition 2024 - Pie Chart & Components Breakdown
item.description: India's GDP composition 2024 pie chart showing components breakdown. India's rapidly expanding economy showed strong domestic consumption and increasing investment activity as the fastest-growing major economy.

item.title: Components of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) 2024
item.description: An analysis of the components of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) for the United States, China, India, and Nepal for the year 2024, including pie charts and detailed breakdowns.
